events.message: The customer reported an auto collision that occurred on 2024-04-30 involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after verifying keywords such as vehicle and collision present in the initial report.
An agent was assigned promptly to the case to assist the customer throughout the claims process with their car accident.
The company acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and confirmed that the case will be handled with priority.
The claimant was asked to submit pictures of the vehicle damage, police accident report, and their driver’s license for verification.
Customer submitted all requested documents including photos, accident report, and proof of insurance as requested by the agent.
The insurance company began an investigation to assess fault and verify the claims related to the vehicle collision incident.
Investigation concluded, confirming the collision circumstances and confirming fault in accordance with the submitted evidence.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on the damage assessment and policy coverage limits for the auto accident.
The customer provided feedback expressing relief and gratitude for the quick support and clear communication from the agent.
The claim was officially approved by the insurance company following customer agreement to the settlement proposal.
Payment for the approved settlement was processed and issued to the customer to cover the vehicle repair expenses.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after payment confirmation and the customer’s acceptance of the settlement terms.
The claim file was archived for record-keeping purposes after all processes related to the vehicle accident have been finalized.
